Text.val: -- Path and Filenames for Templates and Outputfiles
04.02.2013 SH SCR17678 I/O properties: Changed CharSet = UTF-8 back to Ansi
22.04.2009 MKO SCR14463 Change call messagebox program for other
-- Get directories and convert them to OS Format (Windows/AS400)
search for the first filename which we can use for the output file ...
no more valid output files. Operating has to clean output directory
-- Start producing XML File if no error occurs

ExpSyntax.val: 'old files must be removed from IFS:'&Trim ({0,6})

SQL_STMT_U.val: select clnt101_admno,clnt102_clntno,clic908_ID from :1/clnt,:1/clic where clnt803_contracttermdate>curdate() and clnt901_dateoperational<=curdate() and clic908_admno=clnt101_admno and clic908_clntno=clnt102_clntno and clnt101_admno=1 and clnt103_comm_admno=clnt101_admno and clnt103_comm_clntno=clnt102_clntno and clic908_infs_code='N' order by clnt101_admno,clnt102_clntno

Text.val: Determines file name for output file. The pattern for this file is BnnHAHEL.xml
where nn is a sequence number. We search for the first name where the file does
